name: ACNB Corporation
description: ACNB Corporation is a financial services holding company headquartered in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1857, ACNB operates through its subsidiary, ACNB Bank, which provides a wide range of banking and financial services to individual and commercial customers. The bank's offerings include personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management services. ACNB is dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service while fostering community development and supporting local initiatives. The company prides itself on its long-standing tradition of trust and reliability, adapting to the evolving needs of its customers and the financial landscape. ACNB Corporation emphasizes a community-oriented banking approach, focusing on building lasting relationships with clients and contributing to the economic growth of the communities it serves. With a commitment to technological advancements, ACNB continuously enhances its digital banking services, ensuring customers have easy access to their accounts and financial tools. The company's mission is to provide tailored financial solutions that empower customers to achieve their financial goals while maintaining a strong focus on community engagement and social responsibility.

seo.meta_title: ACNB Corporation | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore ACNB Corporation, a trusted financial services provider committed to community development and customer satisfaction. Discover our banking solutions.

faq.question: What services does ACNB Corporation offer?
faq.answer: ACNB Corporation offers a range of banking and financial services including personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management.

faq.question: Where is ACNB Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: ACNB Corporation is headquartered in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ACNB Corporation?
faq.answer: James P. S. Kauffman is the CEO of ACNB Corporation.
